case.title: Seeking a hispanic male to have a baby with - 20 (Anywhere in nyc)
case.text: I am looking for a hispanic male who is ready for children and marriage...You can be any age between 18-39. I prefer males with long or short hair. Must be serious...You must want mixed children as i am black/ebony...Also you must like chubby/thick/small bbw types. If this is you contact me asap so we can get to know each other....
